CustomField.description: Indicates that the selected shipping account is not a descendant of the billing document account.
CustomField.formula: AND( fferpcore__Account__c != null, OR( fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c = null, AND( fferpcore__Account__r.ParentId != fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c, fferpcore__Account__r.Parent.ParentId != fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c, fferpcore__Account__r.Parent.Parent.ParentId != fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c, fferpcore__Account__r.Parent.Parent.Parent.ParentId != fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c, fferpcore__Account__r.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.ParentId != fferpcore__BillingDocument__r.fferpcore__Account__c)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the selected shipping account is not a descendant of the billing document account.
CustomField.label: Invalid Shipping Account
